Title: Warring Factions
Plot: Mark and Jeremy find themselves in competition for the same woman: Toni from next door. This is not the entire problem with Mark and his love life, rather, he is also lusting after Sophie, a co-worker, but finds himself at a loss with how to put his feelings into action. Jeremy is also pre-occupied, but not with love, with his music.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language
